data.title: Insmed reaches 25-year high, Argenx falters. Both biotech companies surpass Q3 expectations.
data.description: Shares of Insmed soared on Thursday, reaching a 25-year high, while Argenx's stock declined. Both leading biotech firms exceeded third-quarter expectations. Insmed's stock saw a significant increase, while Argenx's performance in the IBD 50 index was less favorable.

data.title: ITT stock reaches record high on earnings nearing first billion-dollar quarter, with key stock rating rising 13 points.
data.description: After reaching a record high, ITT's Relative Strength Rating has exceeded the 80 mark. The stock surged on earnings, approaching its first billion-dollar quarter. Additionally, its key stock rating rose by 13 points in response to the positive financial performance.

data.title: Atmus Filtration Techs stock earns upgraded IBD Relative Strength Rating to 81 from 78, showing improving price performance.
data.description: Atmus Filtration Technologies demonstrates an enhancement in price performance, resulting in an upgrade of its IBD Relative Strength Rating from 78 to 81. The stock of Atmus Filtration Technologies has now earned an RS Rating of 81. This increase reflects the company's improving performance in the market.

data.title: Mastercard reported Q3 2025 earnings call, net revenues up 15%, operating expenses increased 14%, EPS at $4.38 with share repurchases of $3.3 billion, worldwide GDV up 9%.
data.description: Mastercard (NYSE: MA) reported strong Q3 2025 financial results, with net revenues up 15% overall and Value Added Services and Solutions net revenue up 22% on a non-GAAP currency neutral basis. The company's growth was driven by its winning strategy, innovation, and execution. Mastercard continued to see healthy consumer and business spending, with solid performance in various regions. They announced multiple co-brand wins with airlines and retailers, along with expanded partnerships with global bank partners. The company is focused on executing against three strategic priorities: consumer payments, B2B opportunities, and services. They are targeting under-penetrated markets and expanding their acceptance footprint worldwide. Mastercard is also driving growth in digital wallets, agentic commerce, and stablecoins. Additionally, their services portfolio featuring security, consumer engagement, and business insights is driving significant value for customers. Net income and EPS increased by 8% and 11% respectively, driven by strong operating income growth. Worldwide gross dollar volume increased by 9%, cross border volume increased by 15%, and switch transactions grew by 10% in Q3. Mastercard repurchased $3.3 billion worth of stock during the quarter. Overall, Mastercard remains optimistic about its future growth prospects in the payments industry.

data.title: Shake Shack (SHAK) stock rises as company beats Q3 earnings with 36 cents per share and $367.411 million in sales.
data.description: Shares of Shake Shack, Inc. (NYSE: SHAK ) saw an increase in trading on Thursday following the release of their third-quarter financial results. The company reported adjusted earnings per share of 36 cents, surpassing the analyst consensus of 31 cents. Quarterly sales were reported at $367.411 million, reflecting a 15.9% increase from the previous year and surpassing expectations of $364.223 million. System-wide sales also grew by 15.4% year over year to $571.5 million. Same-Shack sales showed a 4.9% increase compared to 2024.

data.title: Dow rises 0.28% to 47,763.34 points, NASDAQ drops 1.02% to 23,714.33 points, Microsoft shares fall by 2% post Q1 results.
data.description: Stocks in the U.S. were trading with mixed results during Thursday's session. The Dow Jones index saw an increase of over 100 points, rising by 0.28% to 47,763.34, while the NASDAQ dropped by 1.02% to 23,714.33. The S&P 500 also experienced a decline, falling by 0.45% to 6,859.64. Financial sector shares showed a notable increase of 1%, whereas consumer discretionary stocks slumped by 1.3%. One of the top headlines was Microsoft Corp. (NASDAQ: MSFT) witnessing a more than 2% decline following the release of their first-quarter financial results. Microsoft recorded revenue of $77.7 billion, marking an 18% increase year-over-year, surpassing the Street's estimated $75.3 billion. The company's quarterly earnings per share were $4.13, beating the Street's estimation of $3.67. For more details, the full story is accessible on Benzinga.com.

data.title: Houston aims to improve economic mobility through collaboration, ranking 11th in upward mobility among low-income children.
data.description: In Houston on October 30, 2025, five prominent organizations came together for the first-ever Houston Economic Mobility Summit to address opportunity disparities. The city is positioned as the 11th among the top 50 metropolitan areas in the United States for improving the economic status of underprivileged children. The summit aimed to delve into innovative and cooperative strategies to bridge these gaps and enhance economic mobility prospects for all residents.

data.title: FNB recognized for workplace excellence with 2025 National Culture Excellence Awards and Top Workplace in Charlotte, NC.
data.description: First National Bank, a subsidiary of F.N.B. Corporation (NYSE: FNB), was recognized as a top workplace in Charlotte, NC. The bank, the largest within F.N.B. Corporation, reaffirmed its commitment to offering an outstanding employee experience by achieving three more distinctions.

data.title: Hyundai to unveil IONIQ 9 off-road SUV concept at 2025 SEMA Show, codesigned by Burton and Jobe, featuring lifted suspension and all-terrain tires.
data.description: Renowned automotive visionaries Jeremiah Burton and Zach Jobe, co-creators of BigTime, have collaboratively designed an off-road concept for Hyundai IONIQ 9. This innovative concept showcases a robust suspension system for enhanced performance, along with auxiliary lighting and distinct wheels fitted with rugged all-terrain tires. These modifications contribute to the IONIQ 9's appeal as an off-road adventure vehicle.
